title: Who can help me finish writing a song? I have half of the lyrics, but I have major writer’s block. - Quora

response.answer_text: I suggest that you print out the lyrics you have. Then write down the goal you have for this song. Then, write down the amount of lyrics you need to complete this song. Then, think about what else you need to write. Then, start writing. After you have written something down, you can sort it out, edit what you have written.

I’m a lyricist with 33 years of experience writing for several major, famous bands. I’ll be able to help you privately here’s my public email addy: sm1thdian@yandex.com. Put a title ‘lyrics’ in the subject line so that I know it’s from you. I will require a favor in return for assisting you.
